import React, { useContext,useEffect } from 'react'; import {LoadingContext} from '../store/Store'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Database() { const [,setLoading] = useContext(LoadingContext); useEffect(() => { setLoading(false) }); return (

You can deploy your databases (mysql, mongodb, posgresql etc) from here with ease. Click on New Databse button to get started.
